law.catch_line: Rules and regulations of County agencies—Filed with Clerk of Circuit Court.

text.section:
Sec. 2-3. Rules and regulations of County agencies—Filed with Clerk of Circuit Court.
Every officer, board, commission, department, or other agency of the County authorized to adopt, promulgate and enforce rules and regulations shall file a copy of all such rules and regulations and amendments thereto in the Office of the Clerk of the Circuit Court as Clerk of the County Commission.
